00054 // procedures de calcul de seeing
00055 
00056 
00057 
00058 /*DOCF Seeing computation on SExtractor parameters 
00059   
00060   It computes a 2D histogram : fwhm of the object on one axis, shape
00061   of the object on the other.  
00062   The histogram is filled with cutted sextractor list, all the saturated
00063   and sextractor flagged are removed.
00064   The shape is defined to be -2.5*log10(flux/fluxmax) (fluxmax is the
00065   higher pixel of the object).
00066   This histogram exhibits a maximum which correspond to the best stars
00067   and then the fwhm of this object give a good and robust estimation
00068   of the seeing.
00069 
00070 */
00071 
00072 int  
00073 CalculeSeeingSE(DatSeeing const & dat, SortieSeeing & sortie, 
00074                 SEStarList const & stlse, 
00075                 SEStarList & seestar, const double nsigma=3);
00076 
00077
